Class guessTheNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • miniGame
      • guessTheNumber

  • public class guessTheNumber
extends miniGame
    Date: May 17th 2018 This class creates the minigame Guess the Number. Parent Class is miniGame. The user chooses a number between 1 and 10 in an attempt to guess the Villains choice. Odds of winning the game can be improved by buying Hypnotic Suggestion Skillbook Item in the Shop.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake

    • Method Detail

      • gameDescription

        public java.lang.String gameDescription​()
        Description copied from class: miniGame
        Parent method for minigames which allows a description of a minigame to be obtained for a specific minigame. The description will be specified in each minigame.
        Overrides:
        gameDescription in class miniGame
        Returns:
        Returns String "Not Implemented Yet" by default.

      • check

        public boolean check​(int userGuess,
                     int VillianGuess)
        This method uses input variables userGuess and VillainGuess to determine whether the User won or not and returns Boolean variable gameWon.
        Parameters:
        userGuess - Integer variable for the number chosen by the User
        VillianGuess - Integer variable for the number chosen by the Villain
        Returns:
        Returns Boolean variable gameWon
